overview:
As CMO for TagMan, Chris leads marketing, communications and strategic partnerships - based out of the New York office. TagMan are changing the way the industry manages tags/pixels/ reporting on enterprise eCommerce websites.

Prior to this Chris most recently opened the East Coast office for digital firm AdGent 007 as their VP Business Development; this, after 7 years at emitch, Australiaâ€™s largest digital media agency, controlling budgets for the marketâ€™s biggest advertisers.

Chris is also the founder of the Digital Ministry, a 5,000+ strong community formed for professionals in the online advertising sector, focusing on topics and issues challenging our industry.

An experienced speaker, presenter and writer, Chris is passionate, coherent and knowledgeable on all the challenges and opportunities facing digital advertisers, agencies and publishers across the American, Australian and UK markets.
